content: and 5 until the length starts to look good to you--or until you fear that you will run out of yarn now you will work the end section row 6 k2tog k to end of row row 7 k2tog k to end of row work row 6 and 7 until you have closed the rectangle knit the last 2 live sts together bind off weave in end done reuse people it s a moral imperative http //knittyprofessors blogspot com/2010/01/free-pattern-sediment-scraps-blanket html page 4 of 4
